Headline: Coronavirus Live Updates: U.S. Borders With Mexico and Canada to Close This Weekend
Snippet: Hospitals on both sides of the Atlantic are struggling as infections climb, and more than 10,000 people have died worldwide. The economic impact is deepening as job losses mount, and the U.S. is extending the tax filing deadline to July 15.
